ValidationRule.description: in data pipeline validation tool, checks if there's data entered in Primary Campaign Source.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK( Contract_Date_Sent__c )), RecordType.DeveloperName = "axcessa", OR( ISPICKVAL( StageName, "Closed Won"), ISPICKVAL( StageName, "Contract Sent"), ISPICKVAL( StageName, "Contract Received") ), OR( ISBLANK( Primary_Campaign_Source__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Data missing in Primary Campaign Source. Check again.
